frame.name: Progress
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> changes from a <fen>Prior_state</fen> to a <fen>Post_state</fen> in a sequence leading to improvement.
<ex><fex name="ent">Their offensive armament</fex> has <t>developed</t> <fex name="pri">from short range missiles</fex> <fex name="pos">to long-range ballistic weaponry</fex> in a relatively short period .</ex> <ex>The <t>maturation</t> <fex name="ent">of warhead technology</fex> is, perhaps, not far off .</ex> <ex><fex name="ent">Recovery in our major overseas markets</fex> has <t>progressed</t> <fex name="man">tentatively</fex> and increased spending by consumers and government does not appear to be benefiting this</ex> <ex><fex name="cau">Why</fex> have <fex name="ent">we</fex> <t>developed</t> <fex name="dom">economically</fex> <fex name="man">as we have</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The object that undergoes change.
<ex><t>Advances</t> <fex name="ent">in marketing techniques</fex> have since rendered it obsolete.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Prior_state
FE.definition:
<def-root>The former state of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
<ex>I think we have <t>advanced</t> somewhat <fex name="pri">from that way of thinking</fex> .</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Post_state
FE.definition:
<def-root>The state of the <fen>Entity</fen> following an advance.
<ex>The roads have now <t>advanced</t> <fex name="pos">to a level of perfection not seen since Rome</fex> .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the progress occurs.
<ex><fex name="tim">When</fex> did the X-wing <t>progress</t> beyond the drawing board?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Rate
FE.definition:
<def-root>The rate at which the change happens.
<ex>His captaincy has <fex name="rat">slowly</fex> <t>matured</t> until he has made us forget the sulky Nasser Hussian era</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>A description of the progress, generally a description comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>).
<ex>Recovery in our major overseas markets has <t>progressed</t> <fex name="man">tentatively</fex> and increased spending by consumers and government does not appear to be benefiting this .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The period over which the progress occurs.
<ex>Screwcap wine seals enable bottle maturation, and provide ideal conditions for <t>maturation</t> of wines <fex name="dur">over a long period of time</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The amount of advancement that the <fen>Entity</fen> has attained.
<ex>Robert's music is <t>developing</t> <fex name="deg">further</fex> as he hones his live set to bring in the diverse elements of pan-African music.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition:
<def-root>The relevant dimension of development.
<ex>Why have we <t>developed</t> <fex name="dom">economically</fex> as we have? </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Cause
FE.definition:
<def-root>An event or state of affairs that brings about the development of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
</def-root>

FE.name: Event_description
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the state of affairs denoted by the target as role fillers in other frames</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstance
FE.definition: <def-root>Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the event itself and any of its participants.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: progress.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: change towards a more advanced condition

lexUnit.name: progress.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: development towards a better, more complete, or more modern condition.

lexUnit.name: development.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the process of developing or being developed.

lexUnit.name: maturation.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the action or process of maturing.
